Communication in the Physical and Social Sciences .A Garvey, W.D. Lin, N. Nelson, C.E. This article focuses on differences between the physical and the social sciences regarding three major factors associated with the dissemination and assimilation of scientific information: (i) lags in the process of information flow; (ii) the organization and effectiveness of informal networks; and (iii) the transfer of information from the informal to the formal domain. .X 65	1	1297 73	1	1297 75	1	1297 76	2	1297 89	1	1297 95	1	1297 104	1	1297 105	1	1297 110	2	1297 124	1	1297 127	1	1297 129	1	1297 155	1	1297 156	1	1297 157	1	1297 161	1	1297 190	1	1297 191	1	1297 197	1	1297 211	1	1297 213	1	1297 214	2	1297 218	1	1297 243	1	1297 307	1	1297 314	1	1297 330	1	1297 356	1	1297 378	1	1297 382	1	1297 450	1	1297 451	1	1297 452	1	1297 459	1	1297 468	1	1297 484	1	1297 492	1	1297 495	1	1297 508	1	1297 511	1	1297 512	1	1297 514	1	1297 518	1	1297 520	1	1297 523	1	1297 524	1	1297 525	1	1297 526	1	1297 529	1	1297 530	1	1297 534	1	1297 544	1	1297 546	1	1297 553	1	1297 560	1	1297 579	1	1297 582	2	1297 584	1	1297 589	1	1297 594	1	1297 603	1	1297 604	1	1297 606	1	1297 609	1	1297 610	1	1297 611	1	1297 612	1	1297 625	1	1297 626	1	1297 630	1	1297 636	1	1297 637	1	1297 642	1	1297 648	1	1297 650	1	1297 655	1	1297 656	1	1297 685	1	1297 692	1	1297 696	1	1297 699	1	1297 703	1	1297 705	1	1297 708	1	1297 726	1	1297 727	1	1297 728	1	1297 731	1	1297 732	1	1297 733	1	1297 734	1	1297 736	1	1297 738	1	1297 739	1	1297 740	1	1297 741	1	1297 742	1	1297 743	1	1297 744	1	1297 755	1	1297 779	1	1297 790	1	1297 820	1	1297 826	1	1297 827	1	1297 879	1	1297 883	1	1297 1004	1	1297 1030	1	1297 1035	1	1297 1050	1	1297 1055	1	1297 1062	1	1297 1078	1	1297 1083	1	1297 1086	1	1297 1089	1	1297 1091	1	1297 1207	1	1297 1256	1	1297 1264	1	1297 1284	1	1297 1285	1	1297 1287	1	1297 1290	1	1297 1291	1	1297 1293	1	1297 1294	1	1297 1295	2	1297 1296	1	1297 1297	6	1297 1300	1	1297 1303	1	1297 1319	1	1297 1346	1	1297 1356	1	1297 1362	1	1297 1364	1	1297 1368	1	1297 1370	1	1297 1372	1	1297 1373	1	1297 1374	1	1297 1375	1	1297 1376	1	1297 1377	1	1297 1386	1	1297 1386	1	1297
